fields.label: Schedule Start Date
fields.name: scheduleStartDate
fields.description: The first day of the schedule

fields.label: Schedule End Date
fields.name: scheduleEndDate
fields.description: The last day of the schedule

fields.label: Add Event Link
fields.name: addEventLink
fields.description: A link to a form or repo to add an event to the schedule

fields.label: Fathom Tracking ID
fields.name: fathomId
fields.description: If fathom is installed you can add an id and track event clicks

fields.label: Navigation Label
fields.name: navigationLabel
fields.description: Add a jump to this section to the navigation.

fields.label: Meta
fields.description: Page title, description, social sharing image
fields.name: meta

fields.label: Social Sharing Image
fields.name: ogImage
fields.description: 1200x630 jpeg, varies across platforms and may end up slightly cropped.

fields.label: Time Slots
fields.name: timeslots
fields.description: If your event needs multiple time slots, add them here. They will be displayed in the event modal.

fields.label: Logo
fields.name: logomark
fields.description: Displayed in the corner of the event card. Should be a 48x48px png.

fields.label: Attendees
fields.description: Maximum number of attendees allowed
fields.name: attendees

fields.label: Attendee Label
fields.description: A label next to the attendee count
fields.name: label

fields.label: Priority
fields.name: priority
fields.description: Lower numbers are closer to the top of the event schedule.

fields.label: Favicon
fields.name: favicon
fields.description: Should be a 48x48px png

fields.label: Logo Type
fields.name: logoType
fields.description: Only visible if there is no image.

fields.label: Logo Margin
fields.description: Space between logo and nav
fields.name: imageMargin

fields.label: Navigation
fields.description: Additional links in the header
fields.name: navItems

fields.label: Link
fields.name: link
fields.description: Items with Sub Navigation will ignore this link

fields.label: Sub Navigation
fields.description: Links below the main nav item
fields.name: subNavItems

fields.description: A button will be included if you have a link and button label, with only a link the entire card is linked
